title: Armored Core 6 Balteus boss guide: How to beat the Watchpoint boss
description: The best AC build, weapons and strategies for beating Armored Core 6's chapter 1 finale boss Balteus.

title: Our Xbox friends will get to play Baldur's Gate 3 after all
description: The technical roadblock preventing Baldur's Gate 3's Xbox release has been sidestepped by leaving out a feature in the Xbox Series S version.

title: There's another new dinosaur game coming, and this one asks: 'How about a co-op Alien: Isolation with velociraptors?'
description: It feels like I blinked and all of a sudden there's a "Jurassic Park-alike" mini-genre.

title: You can launch Starfield as early as August 31, its global release times confirm
description: Bethesda has shared the global launch timing for Starfield beginning with the early access for Premium Edition buyers.

title: Todd Howard kinda wishes he hadn't announced The Elder Scrolls 6 the way he did
description: It's been five years since The Elder Scrolls 6 was revealed, and right now it remains nothing but a title.

title: Armored Core 6 Operation Wallclimber boss guide: How to beat the Juggernaut
description: The best AC build, weapons and strategies for beating Armored Core 6 boss The Juggernaut.

title: Pete Hines can't even put a number on how long Starfield takes to complete: 'I'm at 150-160 hours on my current playthrough and I haven't even come close'
description: We all know the best part of Bethesda games is the side stuff, and it sounds like Starfield has tons.

title: Dark and Darker makes a deal with PUBG publisher Krafton for a mobile release
description: Krafton said it's keeping an eye on Ironmace's legal situation, but apparently didn't want to wait to sign a Dark and Darker deal.

title: I don't like RTS games but I loved Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak, and you can get it for free right now
description: The unexpectedly brilliant Deserts of Kharak injected new life into the moribund Homeworld series when it launched in 2016.

title: Armored Core 6 guide: 11 tips for surviving on Rubicon
description: How to wrap your head around Armored Core 6's complex stat system, earn more mech parts, and more.

title: Starfield has a New Game+ mode with 'unique and exciting twist,' in case the sheer size of the game isn't enough to keep you playing for hundreds of hours anyway
description: Starfield will be the first Bethesda RPG with an NG+ option.

title: The BioWare layoffs include the writer responsible for Dragon Age's best character
description: Varric would not stand for this.

title: A guy with 19 YouTube subs executed perhaps the greatest GTA speedrun in history six weeks ago, and no-one noticed
description: "You avoid damage with set-up and preparation, and by killing everybody else first."

title: Survive a zombie outbreak and screw over other players in The Walking Dead: Betrayal's open beta
description: The world may be ending, but that doesn't mean you can't be horrible to your fellow survivors.

title: Starfield's starter ship has been tested in Kerbal Space Program, and the poor thing won't stop exploding
description: 'It's an aerodynamic mess and would never fly in real life'.

title: PC Gamer Chat Log Episode 26: Our ultimate RPG parties
description: Lauren and Mollie kidnap videogame characters from all over to create the strongest, strangest RPG parties imaginable.

title: How to get Opaque Cards in Destiny 2's Season of the Witch
description: Grab Major and Minor Arcana for the Deck of Whispers.

title: Stalker 2 looks great but, thanks to the situation in Ukraine, is delayed into early next year
description: The studio behind it has been hugely impacted by the ongoing Russian invasion of its homeland.

title: Skateboarding roguelike Helskate shows off damage-buffing barrel rolls, and I'm stoked to shake off the rust
description: Tubular, dude.

title: Is this the new must-have direct drive wheel? MOZA’s $399 PC & Xbox compatible R3 bundle is incoming
description: Sim racing just got easier to enter.

title: D&D's favourite spellblade subclass has been modded into Baldur's Gate 3, along with its much-desired 'blade' cantrips
description: Booming Blade gamers, we're so back.

title: Qualcomm's new gaming handheld chip has Steam Deck and AMD in its sights
description: Much more than merely a souped up phone chip.

title: Nvidia's record-breaking profits are unsurprising but still outrageous
description: The more AI you buy, the more you save.
